title: Lesson 1: Tổng quan kỹ năng Writing TOEIC
prompt: Write a short paragraph introducing yourself. Include your name, where you live, what you do, and your goals for learning English.

title: Lesson 2: Sentence Structure & Grammar Review
prompt: Describe your daily routine using correct tenses and connectors.

title: Lesson 3: Vocabulary for Business Contexts
prompt: Write 5 sentences using business-related vocabulary such as meeting, deadline, colleague, report, and customer.

title: Lesson 4: Describing Pictures in Sentences
prompt: Look at a picture of an office scene and write 5 sentences describing what people are doing.

title: Lesson 5: Using Adjectives and Prepositions
prompt: Write 5 sentences describing your workplace or study place using adjectives and prepositions (e.g. next to, behind, in front of).

title: Lesson 6: Writing Clear and Complete Sentences
prompt: Rewrite the following sentences to make them clear and grammatically correct.

title: Lesson 7: Understanding Email Prompts
prompt: Read an email asking for information about your company and write a short reply providing the requested details.

title: Lesson 8: Writing a Clear and Polite Response
prompt: Write an email response to a complaint from a customer. Be polite and professional.

title: Lesson 9: Common Business Expressions
prompt: Write 5 sentences using common business expressions such as 'follow up', 'in charge of', 'as soon as possible', 'on behalf of', 'due to'.

title: Lesson 10: Structuring an Opinion Essay
prompt: Write a short essay expressing your opinion: 'Do you think working from home is better than working in the office?'

title: Lesson 11: Giving Reasons and Examples
prompt: Write 2 paragraphs giving your opinion about the importance of English in business. Provide clear reasons and examples.

title: Lesson 12: Linking Words and Cohesion
prompt: Write a short essay using at least 5 linking words such as 'however', 'therefore', 'in addition', 'as a result', 'on the other hand'.

title: Lesson 13: Common Mistakes in TOEIC Writing
prompt: Rewrite the incorrect sentences below to make them grammatically correct and natural.

title: Lesson 14: Writing Mock Test
prompt: Complete a full writing test including an email response and an opinion essay.

title: Lesson 15: Review and Improvement Plan
prompt: Write a short reflection on your writing progress. What are your strengths and what do you plan to improve?
